name: Hitmonchan

passive.name: Forbidden Technique
passive.effect: This Pokemon is Fighting type, as well as Dark type. Dark and Fighting energies attached to this Pokemon provide both Dark and Fighting Energy, but only one at a time.

attacks.name: Ebb
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If this Pokemon takes damage next turn, put 1 damage counter beside this Pokemon instead of directly on it. These still affect its health.

attacks.name: Flow
attacks.effect: Move all damage counters beside this Pokemon onto the Defending Pokemon.

flavor: It has dabbled in the dark boxing arts.
